short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension enables you to edit your collectibles display case.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is not affiliated with Sony Interactive Entertainment Inc or PlayStation.

The extension enables limited access to the PlayStation Stars service from your browser.

Recent Updates
-============-
* You can now preview and re-arrange the collectibles on your Display Case. Simply drag-and-drop the collectibles to move them around.
* You can now view a collectible. In your collectibles list, click the ℹ️ button next to the collectible. You can optionally view the full 4K image, or the 1080p rotating video.

The extension enables you to edit your Collectibles Display Case. Note you must have already enrolled in PlayStation Stars before you can use this extension.

After installing the extension, browse to https://store.playstation.com. Sign in to your account. Click the extensions icon to activate it, this will display the extension in the Side Panel. Click the Begin button and follow the instructions to edit your Collectibles Display Case.
